channel.title: CVE Feed for Saho -- ADM100
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Saho -- ADM100

item.title: CVE-2023-38029|2024-08-02T17:23:27.907Z -- saho -- adm100
item.description: Saho’s attendance devices ADM100 and ADM-100FP has insufficient filtering for special characters and file type within their file uploading function. A unauthenticate remote attacker authenticated can upload and execute arbitrary files to perform arbitrary system commands or disrupt service.

item.title: CVE-2023-38028|2024-08-02T17:23:28.093Z -- saho -- adm100
item.description: Saho’s attendance devices ADM100 and ADM-100FP have insufficient authentication. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication to read system information and operate user's data, but can’t control system or disrupt service.

item.title: CVE-2023-38030|2024-08-02T17:30:12.343Z -- saho -- adm100
item.description: Saho’s attendance devices ADM100 and ADM-100FP have a vulnerability of missing authentication for critical functions. An unauthenticated remote attacker can execute system commands in partial website URLs to read sensitive device information without permissions.
